name: Mech Gun
description:
Welcome, pilot!  Looks like this sector has been overrun by rebels again, time to wipe them out!  Do this by combining different components of your mech gun to suit your needs, then use WASD and the mouse to cause some havoc!

Made in 72 hours for ScoreSpace Jam 12!  (Theme: Combining)

Thank you Lucas Bolognesi for the amazing music!  Note: The music changes based on your loadout, listen for all the different combinations!

Link to color palette used

Sound effects generated using SFXR
